results.title: متى يبدأ دوام البنوك بعد عيد الفطر 1446 في السعودية؟ اعرف التفاصيل - تليجراف مصر
results.description: متى يبدأ دوام البنوك بعد عيد الفطر 1446 في السعودية؟ اعرف التفاصيل تليجراف مصرموعد انتهاء إجازة عيد الفطر 1446 للطلاب والعودة للدراسة صحيفة عاجلتمديد اجازة العيد لجميع المدارس في السعودية .. التعليم تعلن الموعد الجديد لـ عودة الدوام الدراسي بعد العطلة saudii-services.comتعرف على موعد عودة الطلاب إلى المدارس بعد إجازة عيد الفطر 1446 مجلة الرجللتنظيم معاملاتك المصرفية.. اعرف متى تبدأ إجازة البنوك عيد الفطر في السعودية 1446 - المساء الاخباري المساء الاخباري

results.title: سعر الدرهم الإماراتي أمام الجنيه المصري في البنوك ثاني أيام عيد الفطر - خاص عن مصر
results.description: سعر الدرهم الإماراتي أمام الجنيه المصري في البنوك ثاني أيام عيد الفطر خاص عن مصرأسعار صرف الدرهم الإماراتي أمام العملات العالمية والعربية.. اليوم الجمعة معلومات مباشرسعر الدرهم الإماراتي أمام الجنيه اليوم الثلاثاء 1 أبريل 2025 تليجراف مصرسعر الدرهم الإماراتي اليوم في مصر الاثنين 31 مارس 2025 وتحديث أسعار العملات بالبنك المركزي. radar2.netبالبنك المركزى 13.75 جنيه للشراء..سعر الدرهم الإماراتى اليوم الأحد 30-3-2025 اليوم السابع

results.title: زلزال ميانمار.. المنظمات الإنسانية تكثف جهود الإغاثة العاجلة
creator: واس- جنيف
results.description: دعت منظمة اليونيسيف المجتمع الدولي إلى التضامن وتمويل الاستجابة الإنسانية العاجلة نتيجة الزلزال الذي ضرب ميانمار مؤخرًا.وأوضحت المنظمة أنها بدأت بتوصيل مواد الإغاثة الطارئة، بما في ذلك التغذية والماء والأدوية ومستلزمات النظافة، مبينة أنها تعمل في ظروف صعبة للغاية في ظل عدم توافر التمويل والكهرباء والصرف الصحي والاتصالات.وأعلنت مفوضية الأمم المتحدة لشؤون اللاجئين عن إرسالها مساعدات الطوارئ لنحو 25 ألف ناج من زلزال ميانمار، في منطقتي ماندالاي وناي بي تاو، وتعمل على المزيد من الإمدادات من مخزوناتها. منظمة الصحة العالميةمن جهة أخرى، قدمت منظمة الصحة العالمية 3 أطنان من الإمدادات الطبية للمستشفيات في ماندالاي وناي بي تاو، في غضون 24 ساعة من وقوع الزلزال.وأشارت المنظمة أنها تجري حصرًا للمستشفيات والمنشآت الطبية المتضررة والمدمرة، وأن 3 منها متضررة بشدة، و22 متضررة جزئيًا وتواصل استقبال المصابين من الحالات الحرجة.

results.title: الشرقية.. ضبط 4 أشخاص لترويجهم مادتي الحشيش والإمفيتامين المخدرتين
creator: واس- الدمام
results.description: قبضت المديرية العامة لمكافحة المخدرات على (4) مواطنين بالمنطقة الشرقية لترويجهم مادتي الحشيش والإمفيتامين المخدرتين، وأُوقفوا واتُخذت الإجراءات النظامية بحقهم، وأُحيلوا إلى النيابة العامة.كما قبضت المديرية على (3) مواطنين ومقيم من الجنسية اليمنية بمنطقة نجران لترويجهم أقراصًا خاضعة لتنظيم التداول الطبي.#مكافحة_المخدرات تقبض على (4) أشخاص بالمنطقة الشرقية لترويجهم مادتي الحشيش والإمفيتامين المخدرتين.#الحرب_على_المخدرات#بالمرصاد pic.twitter.com/e4W6LeQenu— مكافحة المخدرات (@Mokafha_SA) April 1, 2025 مكافحة المخدراتوأهابت الجهات الأمنية بالإبلاغ عن كل ما يتوافر من معلومات لدى المواطنين والمقيمين عن أي نشاطات ذات صلة بتهريب أو ترويج المخدرات.وذلك من خلال الاتصال بالأرقام (911) في مناطق مكة المكرمة والرياض والشرقية و(999) في بقية مناطق المملكة، ورقم بلاغات المديرية العامة لمكافحة المخدرات (995)، وعبر البريد الإلكتروني (Email: 995@gdnc.gov.sa)، وستعالج جميع البلاغات بسرية تامة.

results.title: TraceLink Honored as Top Innovator in Supply Chain Orchestration by Logistics Tech Outlook
results.description: BOSTON, April 1, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- TraceLink, the largest end-to-end digital network platform for intelligent orchestration of the supply chain, has been named Supply Chain Orchestration Company of the Year 2025 by Logistics Tech Outlook Magazine. This award recognizes TraceLink's pioneering contributions to digital supply chain transformation, driven by its Orchestration Platform for Universal Solutions (OPUS) and Multienterprise Information Network Tower (MINT) for Logistics, among many other end-to-end MINT orchestrations. As supply chains grow more complex and disruptions more frequent, companies face mounting challenges to affordably and rapidly integrate with partners in order to manage global logistics. TraceLink addresses this with its proven Integrate Once, Interoperate with EveryoneTM capability, enabling seamless orchestration with a network of over 290,000 trading partners—eliminating the need for costly, point-to-point integrations. MINT, powered by OPUS, empowers manufacturers, third-party logistics (3PL) providers, and other supply chain participants to exchange real-time data, streamline operations, reduce delays, and ensure critical treatments reach patients without interruption. "Today's supply chains are more interconnected than ever, yet many businesses still grapple with limited access to real-time supply chain data from trading partners, which is the core requirement for maximizing product availability, reducing working capital, and leveraging artificial intelligence," said Shabbir Dahod, President and CEO of TraceLink. "At TraceLink, we're committed to solving these complexities by empowering companies to orchestrate shared processes more effectively, reduce risk, and operate with agility in the face of change. By strengthening supply chains and minimizing the impact of disruptions, we advance our ultimate mission: ensuring that life-saving products reach those who need them." MINT turns disconnected operations into a linked, intelligent network—helping companies overcome today's biggest logistics challenges: Preventing StockoutsGain real-time visibility into shipments and delays to reduce missed deliveries and keep products flowing. Reducing CostsCollaborate more effectively with trading partners to reduce unnecessary safety stock while lowering expedited transportation fees. Digitalize Workflows and Add AutomationReplace manual emails and spreadsheets with streamlined, structured communication for faster issue resolution while enabling personnel to proactively address challenges with real-time data. Unlock Actionable InsightsAccess cross-functional supply chain data in real time from trading partners to improve operational performance and eliminate bottlenecks. Build Agility and ResilienceScale digital supply chain networks quickly, adapt to disruptions, and orchestrate logistics and transportation processes across entire global ecosystems. "We are glad to announce TraceLink as the Supply Chain Orchestration Company of the Year for 2025," said Justin Smith, Managing Editor of Logistics Tech Outlook. "By harnessing cutting-edge technologies, TraceLink reinforces its commitment to strengthening digital supply chains and meeting the evolving needs of global life sciences and healthcare companies." TraceLink's continued innovation in supply chain orchestration is setting a new standard for the industry. As global demands increase, the company remains focused on delivering next-generation solutions that empower partners to operate with greater precision, responsiveness, and resilience—driving better business outcomes. For more information about TraceLink, including OPUS and MINT for Logistics and other orchestrations such as Commerce, Direct Supply, External Manufacturing and, please visit tracelink.com. About TraceLinkTraceLink Inc. is the largest end-to-end intelligent supply chain platform for life sciences and healthcare, enabling end-to-end orchestration by connecting more than 291,000 healthcare and life sciences entities through its B2N Integrate-OnceTM network. Leading businesses trust TraceLink to deliver complete global connectivity, visibility, and traceability of healthcare products, ensuring that every patient gets the medicines they need when needed, safely and securely. About Logistics Tech OutlookLogistics Tech Outlook is an enterprise technology magazine It is the go-to resource for senior-level leaders and decision-makers in the Logistics industry to learn and share their experiences with products/services, technologies, and Logistics Technology trends and learn from each other along with short but in-depth articles about top providers in the Logistics sector.

results.title: Vidwud's Free AI-Driven Image to Video Generator Empowers Video Creation
results.description: SAN FRANCISCO, April 1, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Vidwud, an innovative AI-powered video and image creation platform, has officially launched its groundbreaking Image to Video and Text to Video tool. Vidwud simplifies video creation, making it accessible to everyone by offering daily free usage, lightning-fast generation, and stunning video effects with just one click. It's a must-have AI tool for both casual users and creative enthusiasts. AI-Powered Magic: Images to Videos in Seconds Built on cutting-edge generative AI models, Vidwud's Image to Video intelligently analyzes content, applying dynamic effects automatically. Users can effortlessly try multiple artistic styles, including anime, cinematic, and hand-drawn effects, adding a unique and expressive touch to their creations. Free, Fast & Effortless Vidwud removes all barriers from AI-powered video creation. Unlike other AI tools that require expensive subscriptions and time-consuming editing, Vidwud provides free usage every day. It allows users to generate dynamic videos in seconds, making content creation faster and easier than ever. With a zero learning curve, even beginners can produce professional-quality videos instantly. Plus, with a variety of dynamic effects, Vidwud turns static images into eye-catching videos, ideal for social media, creative projects, and personal entertainment. Endless Possibilities: Create, Share, and Go Viral Vidwud provides the perfect tools for viral content, visual storytelling, creative montages, and animated memes, making it ideal for casual beginners, social media enthusiasts, digital artists, and meme lovers. With just a few clicks, users can enhance social media posts, bring static images to life, and create engaging digital stories-all without technical skills. Vidwud's Vision: Pushing AI Creativity Forward "At Vidwud, we believe creativity should be fast, free, and accessible to everyone,"said Delores Greenwood, the PR manager at Vidwud. "We are committed to breaking down technical barriers with our AI tools, making content creation effortless and fun. Vidwud is continuously improving our AI algorithms and will soon introduce more advanced video effects, all while maintaining the strong commitment to user privacy." For more information about Vidwud's Image to Video tool, please visit: https://www.vidwud.com/image-to-video-ai.html About Vidwud Vidwud is an AI-powered content creation platform specializing in intelligent image and video production solutions. From video generation to image enhancement, Vidwud's solutions empower users worldwide to bring their ideas to life easily, quickly, and for free.
